name: Chipotle Chili Sauce
keywords: chipotle, tomato, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 cups partly drained canned tomatoes, preferably imported
2 or 3 chipotle chilies with sauce that clings to each (see note)
1 1/2 tablespoons corn, peanut or vegetable oil

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the tomatoes and chilies in the container of a food processor or electric blender. Blend as finely as possible.
Heat the oil in a skillet, and add the onion. Cook, stirring, until wilted, and add the tomato and chili mixture. Let simmer, stirring often, about 20 minutes.
